# Function to create the HTML equivalent of the \cvevent command
create_cvevent_html <- function(position, date_range, organization, location, detail1 = NA, detail2 = NA, detail3 = NA) {
  # Helper function to create a bullet item only if the detail is not NA
  bullet_item <- function(detail) {
    if (!is.na(detail) && detail != "NA") {
      return(paste0('<li>', detail, '</li>'))
    }
    return("")
  }
  
  # Concatenate the HTML string with conditionals handled in R
html_string <- paste0(
  '<div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: baseline; margin-bottom: 10px;">',
    '<span style="font-weight: bold;">', position, '</span>',
    '<span style="white-space: nowrap;">', location, '</span>',
  '</div>',
  '<div>', organization, ' | ', '<small>', date_range, '</small></div>',
  '<ul style="list-style-type: disc; padding-left: 20px; margin-top: 5px;">',
    bullet_item(detail1),
    bullet_item(detail2),
    bullet_item(detail3),
  '</ul>'
)
  
  # Return the HTML string
  return(html_string)
}
